page.title: 20LIFE-STYLES
page.content: Beauty in 1985 is very important in the life of men and women.Hairdress- ers,cosmetics and clothes shops get a lot of money from people wanting to look beautiful and fashionable.Punk hair styles are very popular with peo- ple between the ages of 15-18.They so- metimes consist of many bright colours Cosmetics and make up are for the face There is mascara to darken the eyes, and lipstick and blusher . The pop music of today is mainly elec- tronic.Electric guitars and organs are used to make the most lively sounds. Synthethisers are also used to make sounds different,like making a piano sound like a guitar.Some records are made to raise money to help charities. Some songs have many words repeated in a rhythm like a chorus.Words in the background usually fade away at the end.
